mapper.select: select * from file where file_fk_num = #{num} and file_type = '객실사진' order by file_num
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET room_name = #{ro.room_name}, room_count = #{ro.room_count}, room_max = #{ro.room_max}, room_min = #{ro.room_min}, room_bed = #{ro.room_bed}, room_size = #{ro.room_size}, room_smoke = #{ro.room_smoke}, room_detail = #{ro.room_detail} WHERE room_num = #{ro.room_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dayroom ( day_max, day_discount, day_price, day_disc, day_count, day_room_num, day_start, day_end ) VALUES ( #{day.day_max}, #{day.day_discount}, #{day.day_price}, #{day.day_disc}, #{day.day_count}, #{day.day_room_num}, #{day.day_start}, #{day.day_end} )

insert into stayroom( stay_num, stay_in, stay_out, stay_discount, stay_price, stay_disc, stay_count, stay_room_num ) values( #{stay.stay_num}, #{stay.stay_in}, #{stay.stay_out}, #{stay.stay_discount}, #{stay.stay_price}, #{stay.stay_disc}, #{stay.stay_count}, #{stay.stay_room_num} )
